column1: # Pin rows contain Pin number and pin name.
# If the pin name is omitted
column2: the pin number is added as name.

column1: # Rows for empty entries have to start with '-'
# Empty lines and lines starting with # are ignored
# LED_PA10 is a dummy and should not be defined. However
# causes a compilation error if there are no LED pins.
# PR #9556 resolves the issue so after it's merged LED_PA10 can be removed.
